de.ityx.mediatrix.data

Class HTMLTemplate

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.ityx.mediatrix.data.ErpsData
      • de.ityx.mediatrix.data.HTMLTemplate
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IErpsData, Serializable

    public class HTMLTemplate
extends ErpsData
    A template can be defined in the subproject. The template is used by sending of the mails. The text that the operator send is inserted into the template. A HTML-template is embedded into the outgoing emails if the template is defined in the current subproject.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
